title: new client ranked stats
body: well, just upgraded the client (not that i had any saying in the matter anyway).... in the old one in my profile i could see in the league tab my ranked position, and in the right there was a button with more info, where you accesed your ranked games stats, number of games, kills, cs count, damage done overall , KDA%, all sorts of info that sometimes is fun to check... now that feature is gone ???? All i can see is the win rate of my top 5 played champions, but where is all the other information i need???? why remove it in the first place??... or is it that i am blind and im not seeing some hiden button somewhere???

replies.body: Now that the legacy client has been retired, the devs can start beefing up the updated version with new stuff.  I don't have info on profile stats like this, but be sure to offer your feedback on the [client discussion ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)boards.  It's not available right now, but doesn't mean it won't come.
So basically. We can no longer retrieve our past rank seasons info????
thanks, ill keep tie feedback coming since is open for it
4 months later, it's still not here.

I feel ya, I don't get why something so important to the game play is not high up on the priority list. 3rd party sits can't even update their website cause riot has the API locked down. Meaning no updated data is being sent out to sites like OP.GG, or LOLKing, LOLSTARS. If they don't get updated soon, i am considering looking into something else. I spend way to much money and mainly time playing this not to have my progress being continually tracked. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
